keyMoments.title: Zenny's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: An old man suddenly falls out of a tree, pointing at Chopper and calling him a monster. The crew discovers this is Zenny, the man who ordered the goats to attack them.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Zenny, the central character of the Goat Island Arc and the island's only human inhabitant.

keyMoments.title: Terminal Diagnosis
keyMoments.description: Chopper examines Zenny and discovers that due to his bad heart condition, Zenny probably only has three days to live.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the emotional stakes of the arc and motivates the crew to help Zenny.

statusHistory.context: Despite terminal diagnosis, survives beyond expected prognosis

abilities.description: Zenny can command and train the goats on the island to follow his orders and attack intruders.
Demonstrates strong intelligence and logic-based problem-solving abilities, including skill at chess.

relationships.description: Chopper diagnoses Zenny's terminal heart condition and provides medical care.

evolutionMoments.description: Chopper examines Zenny and delivers the difficult news about his terminal condition.

relationships.description: Zenny becomes allies with the Straw Hat Pirates after their initial confrontation.

evolutionMoments.description: After learning about Zenny's condition, the crew decides to help him.

reveals.information: Former money lender who did business with pirates
Has a fatal heart condition with approximately three days to live
Lives alone on Goat Island with numerous goats

keyMoments.title: Marine Chase Begins
keyMoments.description: Chief Petty Officer Minchey leads a fleet of Marine ships in pursuit of the Straw Hat Pirates, firing cannonballs at the Going Merry.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Minchey as the primary antagonist for the Goat Island Arc.

relationships.description: Minchey serves as a subordinate under Captain Moore in the Marines.

evolutionMoments.description: Minchey operates under Captain Moore's command during the pursuit of the Straw Hats.

reveals.information: Demonstrates cockiness and greed, particularly in pursuit of treasure

keyMoments.title: Marine Chase Begins
keyMoments.description: Captain Moore commands the Marine fleet pursuing the Straw Hat Pirates along with his subordinate Minchey.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Captain Moore as a Marine commander in the Goat Island Arc.

relationships.description: Captain Moore is Minchey's commanding officer in the Marines.

evolutionMoments.description: Moore commands Minchey during the pursuit of the Straw Hat Pirates.
